about.title: About The Clinic
about.description: Led by Hakeem & Dr. Haji Imtiaz Ahmed Bhutta, we specialize in effective herbal and homeopathic treatments. We are a trusted name in the region, fully registered with the Punjab Healthcare Commission (PHC: 52522), ensuring safe and natural recovery.

services.title: Unani Medicine (Tibb)
services.desc: Traditional Eastern medicine utilizing herbal compounds for chronic ailments.

services.title: Homeopathic Care
services.desc: Holistic treatment method using diluted substances to trigger the body's natural healing.

services.title: Piles (Bawaseer)
services.desc: Effective non-surgical herbal treatment for piles and fissures.

services.title: Respiratory Care
services.desc: Specialized care for Asthma, breathing difficulties, and chronic cough.

services.title: Flu & Catarrh
services.desc: Rapid herbal relief for seasonal flu, nazla, and zukam without drowsiness.

services.title: Pansar Store
services.desc: Authentic, high-grade herbs, oils, and natural ingredients available in-store.
